document: Guess there's a few new appalling quotes we can add to our list, huh?
“It would take an hour and a half to learn everything there is to learn about missiles. … I think I know most of it anyway.” #nevertrump
"Let me tell you, I’m a really smart guy." #nevertrump
"I think the only difference between me and other candidates is that Im more honest and my women are more beautiful" https://t.co/4qYc07snGi
"@michellemalkin You were born stupid!" #NeverTrump #ShesAlsoAwful
"Robert Pattinson should not take back Kristen Stewart.She cheated on him like a dog & will do it again-just watch. He can do much better"
“Happy #CincoDeMayo! The best taco bowls are made in Trump Tower Grill. I love Hispanics!” #nevertrump
“China’s Communist Party has now publicly praised Obama’s reelection. They have never had it so good. Will own America soon.” #NeverTrump
“Maybe he should have been roughed up.” - referring to a protester #nevertrump
“He’s (Sen. McCain) not a war hero. He was a war hero because he was captured. I like people who weren’t captured.” #tcot
“I mean what was he doing with Lee Harvey Oswald, shortly before the death — before the shooting? It’s horrible.” about Sen Cruz's father
“Do you think Putin will go to The Miss Universe Pageant in November in Moscow if so, will he become my new best friend?”  #nevertrump
“I’ve won many club championships and I was always the best athlete. But I’ve won many a club championship.” #NeverTrump
“You know, it doesn’t really matter what [the media] writes as long as you’ve got a young and beautiful piece of ass.” #TCOT #NeverTrump
"@ariannahuff is unattractive both inside and out. I fully understand why her former husband left her for a man." #nevertrump
"Black guys counting my money! I hate it." #nevertrump
"I would love to be a well-educated black, because I believe they do have an actual advantage." #nevertrump
“It would take an hour and a half to learn everything there is to learn about missiles. … I think I know most of it anyway.” #nevertrump
"laziness is a trait in blacks." #nevertrump
'Women: “You have to treat ’em like shit.”' #nevertrump
"My twitter has become so powerful that I can actually make my enemies tell the truth." #nevertrump
"@michellemalkin You were born stupid!" #NeverTrump #ShesAlsoAwful
“China’s Communist Party has now publicly praised Obama’s reelection. They have never had it so good. Will own America soon.” #NeverTrump

“How stupid are the people of Iowa?” #NeverTrump #TCOT

"Truly weird Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky reminds me of a spoiled brat without a properly functioning brain. He was terrible at DEBATE!"
